summary: Building an AI-powered sales system platform with automation features including Service Recommendation, Proposal Generator, and other Automation page tools, using a teal-green + black theme.
architectural_notes: Teal-green + black color theme applied across the platform
known_issues: Version 14 expired and needs to be rebuilt fresh

existing_features.title: Rebuild the AutomationPage to feature a dedicated 'AI Sales System' section as the primary focus, displaying clearly organized panels for: (1) Sales System Configuration (API endpoint + API key input with connection test), (2) Automation Rules toggles (e.g., WhatsApp auto-reply, proposal auto-send, lead follow-up), and (3) Integration status indicators. The page must use the teal-green + black theme consistently.

Rebuild the ServiceRecommendationPage as a fully functional AI-powered service recommendation tool. The page must collect: business type, budget range, and business goals from the user via a form, then call the configured AI/API endpoint (from SalesSystemConfig) to return and display tailored service recommendations with name, description, and a suggested pricing tier. If no API is configured, show a fallback rule-based recommendation.

Rebuild the ProposalGeneratorPage as a fully functional AI-powered proposal creation tool. The page must include a form with fields for: client name, client business type, selected services, project scope/notes, and budget. On submission, it calls the configured AI/API endpoint to generate a professional proposal. The generated proposal must be displayed in a formatted preview and support downloading as a print-formatted PDF.

Add a `useUpdateSalesSystemConfig` mutation and `useGetSalesSystemConfig` query in `frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts` to connect the frontend Sales System Config panel to the backend storage functions.

Add sidebar navigation entries for 'Service Recommendation' and 'Proposal Generator' pages under an 'AI Sales Tools' group or within the existing automation section, visible to Admin and Manager roles. Ensure the teal-green + black theme is applied to nav items consistently.

new_feature_requests.summary: AI-powered sales system automation page with Service Recommendation and Proposal Generator features

Ensure the backend Motoko actor stores and retrieves the Sales System integration configuration (API endpoint URL and API key) per user/admin, and exposes query and update functions for getting and setting this configuration. This data should persist across sessions.
